description:
Isaka Ryuuichirou is the senior managing director of Marukawa Publishing. He is acquainted with Sekaiichi Hatsukoi`s Ritsu`s parents and is a childhood friend of Junjou Romantica`s Haruhiko. He is 32 years old in the main time line. Isaka aspired to be a novelist, but his real talents lay in finding future best-sellers.
He appears in both Sekaiichi Hatsukoi and Junjou Romantica and is together with his assistant Asahina the main character of the short comics released with the Junjou Romantica DVDs, Junjou Mistake. Junjou Mistake takes place ten years before the main Romantica storyline.
name: Isaka Ryuuichirou
